author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Update the analyzer code to test the showerlibrary and the script which combines all momentum bins to make the library (from Lev)

#### PR validation:

The new shower library for HF was created (used in the PR #34432) using the script and tested using the analyzer

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-hcx302 Update the analyzer code to test the showerlibrary and the script which combines all momentum bins to make the library
